short_description: fastpath function which takes a table of target vectors and a table of reference vectors(optional) and returns a table that contains the distance between the target-reference pair.
long_description: fastpath function which takes a table of target vectors and a table of reference vectors(optional) and returns a table that contains the distance between the target-reference pair.

input_tables.name: TargetTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains target table vectors.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains target table vectors.

input_tables.name: ReferenceTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains reference table vectors.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains reference table vectors.

argument_clauses.name: TargetIDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the target table column that contains identifiers of the target table vectors.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the target table column that contains identifiers of the target table vectors.

argument_clauses.name: TargetFeatureColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the target table columns that contain features of the target table vectors.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the target table columns that contain features of the target table vectors.

argument_clauses.name: RefIDColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the reference table column that contains identifiers of the reference table vectors.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the reference table column that contains identifiers of the reference table vectors.

argument_clauses.name: RefFeatureColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the names of the reference table columns that contain features of the reference table vectors.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the names of the reference table columns that contain features of the reference table vectors.

argument_clauses.name: DistanceMeasure
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the distance measures that the function uses.The default value is 'cosine'.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the distance measures that the function uses.The default value is 'cosine'.

argument_clauses.name: TopK
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies, for each target vector and for each measure, the maximum number of closest reference vectors to include in the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies, for each target vector and for each measure, the maximum number of closest reference vectors to include in the output table.
